item.title: R and Python Usage
item.description: #install.packages("reticulate") library(reticulate) corona <-"Support essential workers" corona="during the COVID-19 pandemic!" print(r.corona,corona) ## Support essential workers during the COVID-19 pandemic! cat(c(corona,py$corona)) ## Support essential workers during the COVID-19 pandemic!
